column5: i will be down at the marina tomarrow, to see if i can find any of the jumbos  . so just a heads up if anyone is going down, i will be in a red and black floater suit, OFC hat and a OFC sticker on my pail.  pikeie
good luck to you!  Not sure if anyone ever gets jumbos in there, but I've seen some in the 10 inch range.  We fished a bit today for 2 hours and caught a ton of dinks

well ive seen a few jumbos caught down there. got one the other day pushing 12 inches. and seen many over 12 this year. so we will see. but anyways the fishin is always fast and furious, so it will keep me busy lol.
Might see you there, dirty old orange floater coat, pants...yes, colour don't know yet. And the hat that gives it away of course. Not before 0830or so.
ok will keep an eye out for u fisherman!
Just had a chat with fisherman down at the docks.Action is very slow.Water is starting to clear up a bit.  Seen 7-9 inchers caught thats all.

Keep the reports coming fellas, I may try to head down for a couple of hours on Thursday with my friends 3 and 5 yr olds, they need to test out their new rods  .  I'm not concerned about size, I just want them to catch something.  If we go I'll be going to Tiffin launch as I expect the docks to be too unsteady for them  Maureen

well i havent been able to head out yet  , i will be leaving in an hour or so  . the docks arnt really all that unstedy, the lauch would be better if u are worying about them falling. but the marina is also very shelterd so the wind and waves are all most non-exestent. so if u do bring them to the docks, they should still wear a life jacket, dont want to take that chance. good luck Mo
good luck to both of you, let us know how you do
